com.learn.android.demos.toast

类 Crouton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.learn.android.demos.toast.Crouton

  • public final class Crouton
extends java.lang.Object
    Displays information in a non-invasive context related manner. Like android.widget.Toast, but better.

    Important: Call clearCroutonsForActivity(Activity) within Activity#onDestroy() to avoid Context leaks.

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • makeText

        public static Crouton makeText(Activity activity,
               java.lang.CharSequence text,
               Style style)
        Creates a Crouton with provided text and style for a given activity.
        参数:
        activity - The Activity that the Crouton should be attached to.
        text - The text you want to display.
        style - The style that this Crouton should be created with.
        返回:
        The created Crouton.

      • makeText

        public static Crouton makeText(Activity activity,
               java.lang.CharSequence text,
               Style style,
               ViewGroup viewGroup)
        Creates a Crouton with provided text and style for a given activity.
        参数:
        activity - The Activity that represents the context in which the Crouton should exist.
        text - The text you want to display.
        style - The style that this Crouton should be created with.
        viewGroup - The ViewGroup that this Crouton should be added to.
        返回:
        The created Crouton.

               java.lang.CharSequence text,
               Style style,
               int viewGroupResId)

        参数:

        text - The text you want to display.
        style - The style that this Crouton should be created with.
        viewGroupResId - The resource id of the ViewGroup that this Crouton should be added to.
        返回:
        The created Crouton.

      • showText

        public static void showText(Activity activity,
            java.lang.CharSequence text,
            Style style)
        Creates a Crouton with provided text and style for a given activity and displays it directly.
        参数:
        activity - The android.app.Activity that the Crouton should be attached to.
        text - The text you want to display.
        style - The style that this Crouton should be created with.

      • hide

        public static void hide(Crouton crouton)
        Allows hiding of a previously displayed Crouton.
        参数:
        crouton - The Crouton you want to hide.

      • cancelAllCroutons

        public static void cancelAllCroutons()
        Cancels all queued Croutons. If there is a Crouton displayed currently, it will be the last one displayed.

      • clearCroutonsForActivity

        public static void clearCroutonsForActivity(Activity activity)
        Clears (and removes from Activity's content view, if necessary) all croutons for the provided activity
        参数:
        activity - - The Activity to clear the croutons for.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancels a Crouton immediately.

      • show

        public void show()
        Displays the Crouton. If there's another Crouton visible at the time, this Crouton will be displayed afterwards.

      • getInAnimation

        public Animation getInAnimation()

      • getOutAnimation

        public Animation getOutAnimation()

      • setLifecycleCallback

        public void setLifecycleCallback(LifecycleCallback lifecycleCallback)
        参数:
        lifecycleCallback - Callback object for notable events in the life of a Crouton.

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Removes this Crouton.
        从以下版本开始:
        1.9

      • setOnClickListener

        public Crouton setOnClickListener(OnClickListener onClickListener)
        Allows setting of an OnClickListener directly to a Crouton without having to use a custom view.
        参数:
        onClickListener - The OnClickListener to set.
        返回:
        this Crouton.

      • setConfiguration

        public Crouton setConfiguration(Configuration configuration)
        Set the Configuration on this Crouton, prior to showing it.
        参数:
        configuration - a Configuration built using the Configuration.Builder.
        返回:
        this Crouton.

        返回:
